statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(LENGTH(customer_name)) AS avg_name_length FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_behavior JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_behavior INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_behavior INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_age, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_behavior
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customer_behavior JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_behavior JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT AVG(customer_age) AS avg_age, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase FROM customer_behavior JOIN purchase_history ON customer_behavior.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, customer_count FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_count > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT segment_name, customer_count FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_count > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT name, email, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, sum(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, product_name, quantity FROM purchases WHERE quantity >= 5 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM customers INNER JOIN analytics ON customers.customer_id = analytics.customer_id WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_method FROM purchases JOIN transactions ON purchases.purchase_id = transactions.purchase_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, activity_level FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, result_description, analysis_date FROM analytics_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_id, result_description, analysis_date FROM analytics_results
